attributes.action: Stop oil companies destroying our natural Salmon stocks
attributes.additional_details:
To my disgust I came across this article today:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-cornwall-20723552

To read that there was a possibility that Salmon stocks could have been effected really bought a tear to my eye.

Sign my petition to lobby the government to protect Salmon stocks more effectively, and thus protecting the perfect but simple British Salmon dinner we all love.
